text: Your dream investment property and second home awaits! Nestled in Village Camp Flagstaff, this charming Spruce Adventure Cabin is a luxury, fully furnished, turn-key cabin in the woods. Sleeping up to 7, it's ready for you to enjoy up to 180 days per year. The Spruce features upgrades like a downstairs porch and an upstairs walk-out deck with mountain views, plus fire pits both on the deck and at ground level. When you're not using it, Village Camp manages rentals, maintenance, and guest services-so you can collect monthly income with zero hassle. Why this is a great opportunity: Move-in ready with everything included Passive income through professional rental management Perfect location for nature lovers seeking comfort and amenities Village Camp amenities include:
formatted_address: 1 Village Camp Dr Unit 164, Bellemont, AZ, 86015
broker_name: MY HOME GROUP REAL ESTATE, LLC.

text: Beautiful 6-bedroom, 3-bath home in Flagstaff Meadows offering over 3,600 sq/ft, two spacious living areas, and great natural light throughout. The family room features a stone fireplace, while the separate living room provides an ideal space for relaxing or entertaining. The primary suite showcases a direct view of Mount Humphrey along with a steam shower and dual sinks. Upgrades include a tankless water heater, recirculating pump, and efficient 3-zone heating and cooling. The fenced backyard opens to a large park and pond-perfect for kids, pets, and family activities. Short-term rentals are allowed, making this an excellent Airbnb or vacation rental with strong income potential. A 3 car garage, landscaped yard, and easy access to forest trails complete this ideal Northern Arizona home.

Beautifully located in Bellemont, Arizona, just 6 miles from downtown Flagstaff, this 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 1746 sq foot home, is situated on a premium lot with access to U.S. federal forest land right behind the back yard. The meadow to the tree line is a short, beautiful walk for family and pets. The house was recently painted inside (2025) and out (2021). It has a new roof (2025), new appliances (2025) and newer windows (2020). Upgraded lights throughout the , entire home were recently added in December 2025. Cherry cabinetry, gas fireplace, large tub. Eagles and multicolored sunsets abound right in your backyard.

Beautifully located in Bellemont, Arizona, just 6 miles from downtown Flagstaff, this 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 1746 sq foot home, is situated on a premium lot with access to U.S. federal forest land behind the back yard. The meadow to the tree line is about 3 miles; great for walking your pets. The house was recently painted inside (2025) and out (2021). It has a new roof (2025), and new windows (2020). Cherry cabinetry, gas fireplace, large tub. Eagles and multicolor sunsets abound; a great home for anyone wanting the great outdoors right in their back yard.

Welcome to your Bellemont retreat, perfectly positioned between Flagstaff and Williams and right by U.S Forest Land. This 4-bedroom home offers the rare combination of privacy, space, and stunning natural surroundings - all just minutes from town conveniences. A paver walkway leads to an inviting entry with soaring ceilings and bright, open living spaces. Featuring 3 fireplaces that add warmth and ambiance, creating a beautiful space for everyday living and entertaining. The large kitchen and island is designed for hosting with ease. Spacious bedrooms, a tankless water heater provide modern comfort and functionality. Step outside to your private yard featuring a gas fire pit, the perfect setting for entertainment. Elegant, welcoming, and surrounded by nature, this is Bellemont's finest!

Meticulously maintained 4 bedroom single-level home featuring an open great room, dining area, and chef's kitchen with Viking appliances. Cozy gas fireplace with malapai stone surround and easy access to a covered patio with pergolaperfect for entertaining. The master suite offers a large walk-in closet and soaking tub. This home includes solar, AC, surround sound wiring, and a 2-car garage with bump-out. Call today to schedule a private showing.

Discover your new home here in Bellemont, where fresh touch-up paint and immaculate spaces create true move-in readiness. Every detail has been carefully refreshed, allowing you to simply unpack and start enjoying your new surroundings. Inside, spacious rooms offer both comfort and flexibility-perfect for entertaining guests or unwinding during quiet evenings in. The kitchen stands out with its elegant black granite countertops and a large walk-in pantry, catering to every culinary need. Even the garage has been freshly painted, adding a crisp, finished touch. Step outside to a backyard designed for relaxation and gatherings, featuring a retaining wall for security and lush turf. (More) **AGENT IS RELATED TO THE SELLER** PRICED UNDER MARKET!!! The yard faces Shadow Mountain, providing not only beautiful views but also a sense of privacy and tranquility. Year-round comfort is ensured with air conditioning throughout the home. Coupled with the warmth of a friendly, welcoming neighborhood, this property is ideal for first-time buyers or anyone seeking a blend of style, convenience, and community charm. New carpet was installed upstairs 08/2025 and Luxury Plank Vinyl was added 08/2024. 25k went into pavers, a retaining wall and turf. Professionally installed.

Welcome to this beautifully maintained home in the heart of Bellemont, Arizona! When you walk into 12311 Pegasus, the first thing you notice is the warm and inviting floorplan making entertainment easy while still providing privacy for guests. Built in 2018 this property offers modern comfort and convenience in an established community with a bright future. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, ample cabinet space, and a breakfast bar, perfect for everyday living. The primary suite includes an en-suite bathroom, while two additional bedrooms provide flexibility for family, guests, or a home office. A two car garage adds convenience and storage, while the low maintenance backyard gives you calm and peace of mind.

Situated on an end lot with undeveloped land to the East, this single level charmer is a fantastic opportunity at affordable homeownership in one of greater Flagstaff's newest communities. This 3br/2ba home features an open floorplan with builder upgrades throughout. The main living space hosts a spacious kitchen with stainless appliances, quartz counter tops and a walk-in pantry. The kitchen overlooks an adjacent dining area and cozy family room perfect for entertaining. The primary suite features an ensuite bathroom with a custom tile walk-in shower, dual sink vanity and walk-in closet. The split floorplan hosts two private guest bedrooms with a shared bath. The large backyard is the perfect canvas for your outdoor living space. Large driveway and 2 car garage with ample parking!

Don't miss this stunning single-level home in the new Forest Meadows community in Bellemont, just minutes from downtown Flagstaff. This 3-bedroom, 2-bath open-concept home backs open green space with breathtaking San Francisco Peaks views. The kitchen features high-end appliances and granite countertops throughout. The primary suite offers a tiled walk-in shower, dual sinks, and a spacious walk-in closet. Offered fully furnished and turnkey just in time for winter. With snow arriving in Flagstaff, now is the perfect time to hit the slopes, then unwind in the jacuzzi after a cold day on the mountain. Nearby hiking and biking trails and low-maintenance landscaping make this ideal as a primary residence, second home, or short-term rental. Schedule your private showing today.

Enjoy the beauty & serenity of living on this 11.6 acre fenced & gated property next to Kaibab National Forest on 2 sides in the Flagstaff area. This property is like no other and a MUST see! The property has a total of 9 buildings including a 2800 sf, single story primary home w/ unattached oversized 2 car garage & 2 stall carport (home & garage are connected by large, covered breezeway). Built in 2008 & awarded the Platinum rating by the US Green Building Council. It was the first of its kind in AZ using all sustainable building materials which gives it a high energy efficiency rating (total energy bill last month was 14). The property has an enormous amount of built in cabinetry & walk-in closets. The property is classified as horse property & includes several stables. The main house has 4 bd, 2.5 b., French or patio doors open from all the rooms onto a large Trex deck or paver brick patio & has beautiful architectural detail throughout the home. The guest house is 1400 sf, 3 bd. 1.75 b (pool table conveys). The original 900 sf pioneer home (forced air heat) is now a fused glass art studio., there are 2 barns, 1 equip build., a stone 32 ft labyrinth, a large raised walled garden, 12 kW solar (owned), 2,5 kw wind turbine (owned) and a completely new metal roof, new gutters & new high efficiency heating and cooling radiant floor system, & 30,000 gallons of rainwater storage, an automated sound and security system.
formatted_address: 995 N Transwestern Pump Rd, Bellemont, AZ, 86015
